name: MONOWARS: Red Zone
description: Warp into battle against massive monochrome networks controlled by the CrimsonSync AI group. Upgrade your tank and your army as the enemy adapts against your one conquestive mission; eliminating all of them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 3450 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card Additional Notes: Scripting and physics are the greatest factors to RAM intensity
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 3450 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card Additional Notes: Scripting and physics are the greatest factors to RAM intensity
